description: This schema defines the structure of a clustered customer dataset.

columns.description: An identifier that best describes the customers name.
An identifier that best describes the customers name.
The city in which the customer resides or operates.
The country in which the customer resides or operates.
The membership type or category of the customer.
The state or province in which the customer resides or operates.
The year associated with the record.
The Quarter of the year, best describes as 1,2,3,4.
The amount of total sales the customer order for the quarter.
The average amount of sales the customer order for the quarter.
The amount of total quantity the customer order for the quarter.
The average amount of quantity the customer order for the quarter.
The quantity amount the customer order for the quarter.
The count of ordered infusion-related items.
The count of ordered infusion systems.
The count of ordered vascular access systems.
The count of ordered oncology-related items.
The count of ordered miscellaneous items.
The count of ordered veterinary items.
The count of ordered service-related activities.
The count of ordered critical care-related items.
The count of ordered respiratory-related items.
The count of ordered solution-related items.
The count of ordered uncategorized items.
The categorized of sales valued customer.
The categorized of quantity amount valued customer
